name: Oak Adventure The Maze
description:
OAK Adventure The Maze
   You are Oak a Man From Another Dimension Who are Summoned For Saving This Crumbling World by Adventuring and Solving Mysteries Through Labyrinths.

Features
  • RPG Maker Game .
  • Single Player Role-Playing.
  • 7 Maze Maps and 2 Game Mode .
  • No Battle Scene.

Developers Describe
  • Play For Fun.
  • Do Not Play For a Long Time.
  • Parent Should Monitor and Give Advices During Children are Playing Video Game.
  • This is Short Game.(20 Min to 1 Hr)

Thank You.
